value:
$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Alfonse! Over there!$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|So, Ótr, you've been working
with Eitri?$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Ótr! Brother...$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face|Ah, Reginn... I see you are still
clinging to that child's bauble.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Anger|It's not a bauble! It was a gift,
and it means a lot to me!$k$pMy brother Fáfnir made it for me...$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Oh, come off it... You dare speak
to me as if you're my sister now?!
You make me sick!$k$pI already told you, did I not? No
matter how much you call us your
brothers, we are no longer family!$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Ótr! How can you say such things?!$k$pYou and Fáfnir...both of you...$k$p$EFace_Cry|You were always so kind before.
But now... I don't understand what
changed between us!$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face|Ugh. You've always been like this,
crying to get people around you to
help and protect you... I'm sick of it.$k$p$EFace_Anger|If you cannot understand us now,
I doubt you ever can.$k$pYou will never understand someone
like me, someone who guards a great
secret that no one else can know.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Pain|What...what do you mean?$k$p$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Cool|You will die not knowing. The secret
of the past is mine alone to keep...
I will tell you nothing! Not a word!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_01,0|$WmMEID_オッテル,ch00_31_Otr_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Damn it.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Ótr! Wait!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|He's retreating to the sanctum.
After him!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|But Eitri will be at the sanctum...
She might be our enemy too, right?
Is it safe to follow him?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain2|Her seiðjárn is certainly fearsome,
but we have no choice but to follow
him now.$k$p$EFace_Anger|We'll be there soon! Please stay
safe, $Nu!$k$p$Sbs150|
